channel.title: Can someone host my server?
channel.description:
Hello , me again :D I need someone to host my server , since it is going to get popular now , i added it to the moparscape server status checker and now many people play on my server Thats good , but not for my internet , i only got 12GB of space to Download And Upload , since there are like 30 people on my server everytime i my upload goes extremly fast! And my way to go on the broadband is going very fast ..
So now i would like to ask if someone can Host my server ? Since i would like to host it , its fun , sometimes you being spammed n stuff but that doesn't matter I would like someone that i can Trust and wants to receive weekly updates of my server
Thanks in advance !

item.title: Can someone host my server?
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

Songoty:

Also, i think Anti Pizza is one of those virus guys -.- Needs his own server hosted, now will host?

Yes , thats strange

And what should i give the hoster lol ? Co Ownership ?
I can’t pay or something , im just 13 yrs old[br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2007, 08:39:50 AM[/size][hr]Nevermind ! Got a hoster
Thanks anyway

Read full topic
